game.name: Fire and Brim Co.
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Embark on an epic adventure in this top-down action RPG! Take on the role of Ned, a disgruntled demon employee seeking to restore Hell's former glory. Confront your resistant manager, battle the 7 Sins and Satan, and make Hell great again in this thrilling demon-filled quest!
